START_COMMAND_MESSAGE: 👋 Hello, {full_name}! 🔗 To download a file, send me a direct link. 📖 Help - /help
HELP_COMMAND_MESSAGE: @{bot_username} is a bot for downloading files via direct links. How to use: 🌐 1. Send me a direct link to the file ✍️ 2. Choose a name for the file or leave the default name 💾 3. Click the 'Download' button 🚀 4. Wait for the file to download and be uploaded to the Telegram server 💡 Direct links are links that immediately start downloading a file or open a video/image, etc. 👉 Examples of direct links: https://w.wallhaven.cc/full/2y/wallhaven-2yxp16.jpg https://trashbox.ru/files20/1957124_683e4b/mark.via.gp-20240524.apk https://file-examples.com/wp-content/storage/2017/04/file_example_MP4_1920_18MG.mp4
